comment: using NLG systems every day, I know that however good the output is, it still makes small mistakes that need correcting such as confusing "me" and "you" roles.

Without an understanding of errors, especially regarding what the most frequent errors involve, it is quite hard to correctly develop a system. It may end up being just blind hyperparameter optimisation (for NN ones)
I haven't read plenty of literature as NLG is only part of my research
